definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: settled abode or haunt (‖ form of [[חָחֵר]] supr., or txt. err. for it);—[[נְוֵה]] [[תַנִּים חָחִיר לִבְנוֹת יַעֲנׇה]] Is 34:13 a dwelling of jackals (and) a hunt for ostriches; also [[בִּנְוֵת תַנִּים רִבְחָהּ]] [[חָחִיר לְקָנֶה וׇגׁ֑מֶא]] Is 35:7 an abode, home, of reeds and rushes (so Che Di Du al.; others put this under II. [[חָחִיר]]); Che Du think the v. mutilated, and would emend this line acc. to Is 34:13.
